name: Werewolf Wake
description:
Werewolf Wake, a murder mystery sex comedy transformation text game.

You are invited to a reading of a will on an isolated island. You don't know the person who died, but hey, all expenses are paid, so you go! You soon discover that you weren't the only one invited and there is a killer werewolf in the group. Will you solve the mystery of who is the werewolf or will you be the next victim?

This game contains adult sexual content. This game has a male protagonist along with six male characters and six female characters. The sexual content includes M/M, M/F, M/M/M, M/M/F, and M/F/F scenes. If you would like to avoid certain content, then either avoid rooms with the undesired characters or go to cheat mode and set the order of deaths to your preference to get rid of those characters early on.

In the original mode, there is only one werewolf. In the contagious modes, the werewolf can transform others.

Who is the killer werewolf and the order of deaths are randomized at the start of each game if you are not playing in the cheat mode.

Note: This game contains death scenes, but they aren't heavily detailed or graphic. Some death scenes include vore.

This is Version 1.04 of Werewolf Wake. You can find more games on my Patreon, discord, and FurAffinity accounts with the specific links listed on the first page of the actual game. If you would like to support me, then become a patron at https://www.patreon.com/desirelines and you will receive access to early content and strategy guides for my games.
